pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()Serpentine Valour is a weapon that feeds of the triumph of its wielder, growing ever stronger. It was stolen many times by warriors bloodthirsty for its raw power. This weapon creates a slick substance upon its blade, delivering a stinging pain when touched.

The pain experienced when the substance is forcefully injected into a foe has made many people submit fully after a single blow. A faint power resonates down its hilt, which is constructed of a fraction of spine from a fallen wyrm.
